Room.Name: Oceancrest Memorial Fountain Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east side of the circular path around the fountain.
Room.LongDescription: The fountain to the west is a combination of modern and classical artwork bringing together very lifelike statues with abstract backgrounds. The fountain is very large and you can occasionally see people with their feet in it. To the east is Regalia Drive, which takes you directly to the Regalia Convent. The circular path continues to the northwest and southwest.
